trans-unit.source: Provides the foundation for custom installations.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a base para instalações personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: This is the base class for all custom installers in the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Esta é a classe base para todos os instaladores personalizados no .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: Installers are components that help install applications on a computer.
trans-unit.target: Instaladores são componentes que ajudam a instalar aplicativos em um computador.

trans-unit.source: There are several steps you must follow to use an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>:
trans-unit.target: Há várias etapas que devem ser seguidas para usar um <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>:

trans-unit.source: Inherit the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class.
trans-unit.target: Herdar o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe.

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute> to your derived class and set it to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.RunInstallerAttribute> para derivada de classe e defina-a como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Put your derived class in the assembly with your application to install.
trans-unit.target: Colocar sua classe derivada no assembly com seu aplicativo para instalar.

trans-unit.source: Invoke the installers.
trans-unit.target: Invocar os instaladores.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the InstallUtil.exe to invoke the installers.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, use o InstallUtil.exe para invocar os instaladores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property contains a collection of installers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> propriedade contém uma coleção de instaladores.

trans-unit.source: If this instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is part of an installer collection, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instance that contains the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se esta instância do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> faz parte de uma coleção de instalador, o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> está definida como o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instância que contém a coleção.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the use of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> collection, see the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo do uso de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> coleta, consulte o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class go through the collection of installers stored in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property, and invokes the corresponding method of each installer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe percorrer a coleção de instaladores armazenados no <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> propriedade e invoca o método correspondente de cada instalação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods are not always called on the same <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos não forem chamados sempre no mesmo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instância.

trans-unit.source: For example, one <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instance might be used while installing and committing an application, and then the reference to that instance is released.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instância pode ser usada durante a instalação e confirmar um aplicativo e, em seguida, a referência a essa instância é liberada.

trans-unit.source: Later, uninstalling the application creates a reference to a new <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instance, meaning that the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method is called by a different instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: Posteriormente, a desinstalação do aplicativo cria uma referência para um novo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instância, o que significa que o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método é chamado por uma instância diferente do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: For this reason, in your derived class, do not save the state of a computer in an installer.
trans-unit.target: Por esse motivo, em sua classe derivada, não salve o estado de um computador em um instalador.

trans-unit.source: Instead, use an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that is preserved across calls and passed into your <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use um <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> que é preservado em chamadas e passado para o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Two situations illustrate the need to save information in the state-saver <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Duas situações ilustram a necessidade de salvar informações na proteção de estado <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: First, suppose that your installer sets a registry key.
trans-unit.target: Primeiro, vamos supor que o instalador define uma chave do registro.

trans-unit.source: It should save the key's original value in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Ele deve salvar o valor da chave original no <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: If the installation is rolled back, the original value can be restored.
trans-unit.target: Se a instalação for revertida, o valor original pode ser restaurado.

trans-unit.source: Second, suppose the installer replaces an existing file.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, suponha que o instalador substitui um arquivo existente.

trans-unit.source: Save the existing file in a temporary directory and the location of the new location of the file in the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Salve o arquivo existente em um diretório temporário e o local do novo local do arquivo de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: If the installation is rolled back, the newer file is deleted and replaced by the original from the temporary location.
trans-unit.target: Se a instalação for revertida, o arquivo mais recente é excluído e substituído por original do local temporário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property contains information about the installation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade contém informações sobre a instalação.

trans-unit.source: For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, informações sobre o local do arquivo de log para a instalação, o local do arquivo para salvar as informações necessárias para o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método e a linha de comando que foi digitada quando o executável de instalação foi executado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o uso da <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe.

trans-unit.source: It creates a class which inherits from <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: Ele cria uma classe que herda de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> is about to complete, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing> event occurs and a message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> é concluída, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing> eventos ocorre e é exibida uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class, you must reference the **System.Configuration.Install** assembly in your project.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe, você deve fazer referência a **System.Configuration.Install** assembly em seu projeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> methods of all the installers in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property have run.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que os métodos do <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> de todos os instaladores na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> foram executados.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is raised by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele é gerado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the installations of all the installers in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property are rolled back.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre após as instalações de todos os instaladores na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> serem revertidas.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback> evento.

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> method and explicitly throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> so that the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Ela substitui o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> método e explicitamente lança um <xref:System.ArgumentException> para que o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> is completed, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback> event occurs and a message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> for concluída, o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback> eventos ocorre e é exibida uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after all the installers in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property perform their uninstallation operations.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que todos os instaladores na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> realizam suas operações de desinstalação.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterUninstall> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is raised by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterUninstall%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele é gerado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterUninstall%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method of each installer in the installer collection has run.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes do método <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> de cada instalador no instalador em que a coleção foi executada.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is raised by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeInstall%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele é gerado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeInstall%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the installers in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property are rolled back.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes que os instaladores na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> sejam revertidos.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback> evento.

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> method and explicitly throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> so that the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Ela substitui o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> método e explicitamente lança um <xref:System.ArgumentException> para que o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> is complete, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback> event occurs and a message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> estiver concluída, o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeRollback> eventos ocorre e é exibida uma mensagem.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the installers in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property perform their uninstall operations.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes dos instaladores na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> executarem suas operações de desinstalação.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeUninstall> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is raised by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeUninstall%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele é gerado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeUninstall%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the state of the computer after all the installers in the collection have run.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém o estado do computador após todos os instaladores na coleção terem sido são executados.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the install transaction.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, conclui a transação de instalação.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> método o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe.

trans-unit.source: A class is derived from the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> base class and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method are overridden.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe é derivada do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe base e o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> método são substituídas.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="savedState" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="savedState" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The saved-state <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> might have been corrupted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> de estado salvo pode estar corrompido.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred during the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> phase of the installation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu uma exceção durante a fase <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> da instalação.

trans-unit.source: This exception is ignored and the installation continues.
trans-unit.target: Essa exceção é ignorada e a instalação continua.

trans-unit.source: However, the application might not function correctly after the installation is complete.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o aplicativo pode não funcionar corretamente após a conclusão da instalação.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method first in your derived method.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método primeiro em seu método derivado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is called only if the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method of each installer in this instance's <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection" /> succeeds.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método é chamado somente se o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método de cada instalador nesta instância <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection" /> for bem-sucedida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method stores information needed to do a correct uninstallation, and calls the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method of each installer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método armazena as informações necessárias para fazer uma desinstalação correta e chama o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método de cada instalador na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after all the installers in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property have committed their installations.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois que todos os instaladores na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> confirmaram suas instalações.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is raised by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele é gerado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the installers in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property committ their installations.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes que os instaladores na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> confirmem suas instalações.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing> evento.

trans-unit.source: It is raised by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ele é gerado pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets information about the current installation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define informações sobre a instalação atual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext" /> that contains information about the current installation.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallContext" /> que contém informações sobre a instalação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property contains installation information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> propriedade contém informações sobre a instalação.

trans-unit.source: For example, information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, informações sobre o local do arquivo de log para a instalação, o local do arquivo para salvar as informações necessárias para o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método e a linha de comando que foi digitada quando o executável de instalação foi executado.

trans-unit.source: The program that calls the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods sets the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property with information that the methods need.
trans-unit.target: O programa que chama o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, ou <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> conjuntos de métodos de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> propriedade com informações de que precisam de métodos.

trans-unit.source: If an installer belongs to an installer collection, the parent installer sets the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property before calling any of these methods.
trans-unit.target: Se um instalador pertence a uma coleção de instalador, o instalador pai define a <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> propriedade antes de chamar qualquer um desses métodos.

trans-unit.source: The parent installer can be accessed through the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O instalador do pai pode ser acessado por meio de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> property contain information about the location of the log file for the installation, the location of the file to save information required by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method, and the command line that was entered when the installation executable was run.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A> propriedade contêm informações sobre o local do arquivo de log para a instalação, o local do arquivo para salvar as informações necessárias para o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método e a linha de comando que foi digitado quando a instalação executável foi executado.

trans-unit.source: These contents are then displayed on the console.
trans-unit.target: Esses conteúdos são exibidos no console.

trans-unit.source: Gets the help text for all the installers in the installer collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto de ajuda para todos os instaladores na coleção de instalador.

trans-unit.source: The help text for all the installers in the installer collection, including the description of what the installer does and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the InstallUtil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by this installer.
trans-unit.target: O texto de ajuda para todos os instaladores na coleção de instalador, incluindo a descrição do que faz o instalador e as opções de linha de comando para a instalação executável, como o utilitário InstallUtil.exe, que pode ser passado para o instalador e compreendido por ele.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.HelpText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.HelpText%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This property is defined in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class, which, when called, returns the description of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> and the command line options for the installation executable, such as the Installutil.exe utility, that can be passed to and understood by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é definida no <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe, que, quando chamado, retorna a descrição do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> e as opções de linha de comando para a instalação do executável, como o utilitário Installutil.exe, que pode ser passado para e entendido pelo <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: One of the installers in the installer collection specifies a null reference instead of help text.
trans-unit.target: Um dos instaladores na coleção de instaladores especifica uma referência nula em vez do texto de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: A likely cause for this exception is that a field to contain the help text is defined but not initialized.
trans-unit.target: Uma causa provável para essa exceção é que um campo para conter o texto da Ajuda está definido, mas não inicializado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> used to save information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> usado para salvar as informações necessárias para realizar uma confirmação, reversão ou operação de desinstalação.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, performs the installation.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, executa a instalação.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> método o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe.

trans-unit.source: A class is derived from the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> base class and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> method is overridden.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe é derivada do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe base e o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> método é substituído.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="stateSaver" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="stateSaver" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred in the <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall" /> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu uma exceção no manipulador de evento <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.BeforeInstall" /> de um dos instaladores na coleção.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred in the <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall" /> event handler of one of the installers in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu uma exceção no manipulador de evento <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall" /> de um dos instaladores na coleção.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method first in your derived method.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método primeiro em seu método derivado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method calls the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method of each installer contained in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property of this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> chamadas de método de <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método de cada instalador contido no <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> propriedade desta instância.

trans-unit.source: After the contained installers run, this method updates the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> object (specified through the <paramref name="stateSaver" /> parameter) to reflect the status of the installation.
trans-unit.target: Depois de executar os instaladores independentes, este método atualizará o <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> objeto (especificado por meio de <paramref name="stateSaver" /> parâmetro) para refletir o status da instalação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> should be empty when passed to the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> deve estar vazio quando passados para o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: If all the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> methods succeed, the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> métodos falharem, o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: If you need to add installer instances to the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> collection in the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar adicionar instâncias de instalador para o <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> coleção no <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método, certifique-se de executar as mesmo adições à coleção o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode evitar a manter a coleção em ambos os métodos se você adicionar instâncias de instalador para o <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> coleção no construtor da classe para o instalador personalizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of installers that this installer contains.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de instaladores que contém esse instalador.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection" /> containing the collection of installers associated with this installer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection" /> que contém a coleção de instaladores associados a esse instalador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property contains a collection of installers that install objects needed by this <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instance to correctly install the component.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> propriedade contém uma coleção de instaladores que instalar objetos necessários por esta <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instância para instalar corretamente o componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class go through the collection of installers and invokes the corresponding method of each installer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe percorrer a coleção de instaladores e invoca o método correspondente de cada instalação.

trans-unit.source: If this instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is contained in an installer collection, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property is the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instance that contains the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se esta instância do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> está contido em uma coleção de instalador, o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> é de propriedade de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instância que contém a coleção.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the use of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> collection, see the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo do uso de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> coleta, consulte o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property shows the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> associated with an <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> propriedade mostra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> associado com um <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the state of the computer after all the installers contained in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property have completed their installations.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém o estado do computador após todos os instaladores contidos na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> terem concluído suas instalações.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterInstall" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called after the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> methods of all the installers in this instance's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> run.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado após o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> métodos de todos os instaladores nesta instância <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> executar.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall%2A> método permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é substituído na classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Space is provided to add steps to be done after the installation in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Espaço é fornecido para adicionar etapas a ser feito após a instalação do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnAfterInstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the state of the computer after the installers contained in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property are rolled back.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém o estado do computador após todos os instaladores contidos na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> terem sido revertidos.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.AfterRollback" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called after the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> methods of all the installers in this instance's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> have run.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeUninstall%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeUninstall%2A> método permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeUninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeUninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeUninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnBeforeUninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the state of the computer after all the installers in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property run.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém o estado do computador depois que todos os instaladores na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> são executados.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committed" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called after the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> methods of all the installers contained in this instance's installer collection run.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado após o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> métodos de todos os instaladores contidos na coleção de instalador desta instância execução.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted%2A> método permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted%2A> método o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted%2A> method is overridden in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted%2A> método é substituído na classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Space is provided for the user to add the steps to be performed before committing and after committing.
trans-unit.target: Espaço é fornecido para o usuário adicionar as etapas a serem executadas antes de confirmar e após a confirmação.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitted(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the state of the computer before the installers in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property are committed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém o estado do computador antes que os instaladores na propriedade <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> sejam confirmados.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Committing" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called before the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> methods of the installers in this instance's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> run.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado antes do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> métodos instaladores nesta instância de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> executar.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting%2A> método permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting%2A> method of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting%2A> método o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting%2A> method is overridden in the derived class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting%2A> método é substituído na classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Space is provided for the user to add the steps to be performed before committing and after committing.
trans-unit.target: Espaço é fornecido para o usuário adicionar as etapas a serem executadas antes de confirmar e após a confirmação.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.OnCommitting(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the installer containing the collection that this installer belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o instalador que contém a coleção à qual o instalador pertence.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> containing the collection that this instance belongs to, or <see langword="null" /> if this instance does not belong to a collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" /> que contém a coleção à qual essa instância pertence, ou <see langword="null" /> se esta instância não pertence a uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: If this instance of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is part of an installer collection, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instance that contains the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se esta instância do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> faz parte de uma coleção de instalador, o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> está definida como o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> instância que contém a coleção.

trans-unit.source: For an example of the use of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> collection, see the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> class.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo do uso de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> coleta, consulte o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property contains a collection of installers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> propriedade contém uma coleção de instaladores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> class go through the collection of installers and invokes the corresponding method of each installer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, e <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> classe percorrer a coleção de instaladores e invoca o método correspondente de cada instalação.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property gets the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing the collection that this <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> belongs to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> propriedade obtém o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> que contém a coleção que este <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> pertence.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém o estado de pré-instalação do computador.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, restores the pre-installation state of the computer.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, restaura o estado de pré-instalação do computador.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> method of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> método <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> method is overridden in the derived class of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> método é substituído na classe derivada de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: An exception is generated to force an installation rollback.
trans-unit.target: Uma exceção é gerada para forçar uma reversão da instalação.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="savedState" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="savedState" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The saved-state <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> might have been corrupted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> de estado salvo pode estar corrompido.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred during the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> phase of the installation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu uma exceção durante a fase <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> da instalação.

trans-unit.source: This exception is ignored and the rollback continues.
trans-unit.target: Essa exceção é ignorada e a reversão continua.

trans-unit.source: However, the computer might not be fully reverted to its initial state after the rollback completes.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o computador pode não ser totalmente revertido para seu estado inicial após a conclusão da reversão.

trans-unit.source: When you override the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method first in your derived method.
trans-unit.target: Quando você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método primeiro em seu método derivado.

trans-unit.source: A rollback operation restores the computer to the state it was in before the installations occurred.
trans-unit.target: Uma operação de reversão restaura o computador para o estado em que estava antes das instalações.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is called if the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" />, or any installer in the installer collection, fail to run correctly.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método é chamado se o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método desta instância do <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.Installer" />, ou qualquer instalador na coleção de instalador, não funcionará corretamente.

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions generated by calling the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> methods of the installers in the installer collection are ignored and the rollback of the other installers continues.
trans-unit.target: Todas as exceções geradas chamando o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> métodos de instaladores na coleção de instalador são ignorados e a reversão dos outros instaladores continua.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the state of the computer after the installation was complete.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém o estado do computador após a conclusão da instalação.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, removes an installation.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, remove uma instalação.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method is overridden in the derived class of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> método é substituído na classe derivada de <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>.

trans-unit.source: The saved-state <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> might have been corrupted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> de estado salvo pode estar corrompido.

trans-unit.source: An exception occurred while uninstalling.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu uma exceção durante a desinstalação.

trans-unit.source: This exception is ignored and the uninstall continues.
trans-unit.target: Essa exceção é ignorada e a desinstalação continua.

trans-unit.source: However, the application might not be fully uninstalled after the uninstallation completes.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o aplicativo pode não estar totalmente desinstalado após a conclusão da desinstalação.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method first in your derived method.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método primeiro em seu método derivado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method calls the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method of each installer contained in the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> property of this instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> chamadas de método de <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método de cada instalador contido no <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> propriedade desta instância.

trans-unit.source: After the contained installers run, this method updates the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> object (specified through the <paramref name="stateSaver" /> parameter) to reflect the status of the installation.
trans-unit.target: Depois de executar os instaladores independentes, este método atualizará o <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> objeto (especificado por meio de <paramref name="stateSaver" /> parâmetro) para refletir o status da instalação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> should be empty when passed to the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> deve estar vazio quando passados para o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: If all the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> methods succeed, the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> métodos falharem, o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: If you need to add installer instances to the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> collection in the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method, be sure to perform the same additions to the collection in the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisar adicionar instâncias de instalador para o <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> coleção no <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método, certifique-se de executar as mesmo adições à coleção o <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método.

trans-unit.source: However, you can avoid maintaining the collection in both methods if you add installer instances to the <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> collection in the class constructor for your custom installer.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode evitar a manter a coleção em ambos os métodos se você adicionar instâncias de instalador para o <see cref="P:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers" /> coleção no construtor da classe para o instalador personalizado.
